com.pb.sawdust.io

Interface IterableReader<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - The type of data the reader iterates over.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Iterable<D>, RuntimeCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader

    public interface IterableReader<D>
extends java.lang.Iterable<D>, RuntimeCloseable
    The IterableReader interface is used to specify a reader which can iterate over a series of data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setCloseAtIterationEnd(boolean closeAtIterationEnd)
      Set whether this reader's iterator should close the reader automatically at the end of the iteration cylce.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        iterator

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pb.sawdust.io.RuntimeCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • setCloseAtIterationEnd

        void setCloseAtIterationEnd(boolean closeAtIterationEnd)
        Set whether this reader's iterator should close the reader automatically at the end of the iteration cylce.
        Parameters:
        closeAtIterationEnd - true if the reader should be closed at the end of the iteration, false if it is to be left open. If false, then close() generally should be called explicitly when iteration is finshed.
